title: Everything to know about ‘Stargate’ from Amazon MGM Studios
text:
"Twenty years ago, my first real job in television was as a story editor on

Stargate: Atlantis

. I spent five years at the franchise working across all three series,

Stargate

taught me everything about making television—it's written into my DNA," Gero says. "I'm beyond thrilled that Amazon MGM Studios has entrusted me with guiding this incredible franchise into its next phase.
